name: Dylan Tarot Deck
description:
How to play:

Choose one of four spreads by clicking on its button
Click on the deck to deal
Click on each card to reveal
Click again to zoom in and out
Interpret each card in context given its position in the spread
i.e. past present future etc.
The Dylan Hat's crown represents what's on top of you (2 cards)
and The Dylan Hat's brim reveals the underneath it all
